src:
Byåsen satte publikumsrekord: Tror ikke de sitter igjen med en krone
04 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Even Berthelsen
Samtidig tror Kolstad at de kan sitte igjen med rundt 200.000 kroner på samme festkveld.
Lørdag ble byens nye storstue, Trondheim Spektrum, innviet med dobbeltkampene Byåsen–Molde og Kolstad–Drammen.
text:
Byåsen set audience records: Don't think they are left with a penny
04 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Even Berthelsen
At the same time, Kolstad believes that they can be left with around NOK 200,000 on the same party night.
On Saturday, the city's new big room, Trondheim Spectrum, was inaugurated with the double matches Byåsen-Molde and Kolstad-Drammen.
